text: ) Consider a network with five nodes, N1 to N5, as shown as below. ' @ 1 3 4 6 2 i : The network uses a Distance Vector Routing protocol. Once the routes have been stabilized, the distance vectors at different nodes are as follows. « N1:(0,1,7,8,4) « N2:(1,0,6,7,3) « N3:(7,6,0,2,6) « N4:(8,7,2,0,4) « N5:(4,3,6,4,0)
